content.text:
# 1983 Dora Mavor Moore Awards

The 1983 Dora Mavor Moore Awards celebrated excellence in theatre from the Toronto Alliance for the Performing Arts.
Winners and nominees
General Theatre Division
{| class=wikitable style="width="100%"
|-
!width="50%" |Production
!width="50%" |Original Play
|-

**The Art of War – Factory Theatre
**Unseen Hand – Toronto Free Theatre
| valign="top" |

**Censored by Richard Rose – Necessary Angel
**The Art of War by George F. Walker – Factory Theatre
**What Is to Be Done by Mavis Gallant – Tarragon Theatre
|-
